name: 4x_Loyaldk-SuperPony_500000_V2.0
author: chasemmd
description:
Category: Anime and Cartoons
Purpose: Animation
Pretrained: none

Upscale MLP episodes. Full version. Able to handle compression better compared to V1.0 and no longer creates halo's/rainbows. Good for Vector 2D art however converts detail to blobs.
dataset: All MLP: FiM Episodes using scene detection frame grabbing as well as selected Prores4444 content https://shimmermare.com/4k-pony-project. Converted Episodes and Movies to 4:4:4 Chroma Subsampling using custom 1x model. LR's Include H264 Compression, H265 Compression, 1x_DotCrawl_125000_G, 1x_DeteriorationFrames V1_102000_G, Gaussian Blur, LitePony Chroma Bleed, Uniform Noise, JPEG Compression, 4:2:0 Chroma Subsampling.
